2025.title: WebAssembly (Wasm) on the Server
2025.description: Originally built for browsers, WebAssembly is now a first-class server compilation target for Rust, Go, and C++. Server-side Wasm delivers fast startup, language portability, and secure sandboxed executionâ€”making it an attractive alternative to containers for microservices and edge workloads.

2025.title: Laravel
2025.description: A powerful backend web framework built on PHP, designed for developing modern, secure, and scalable web applications. It provides elegant syntax and built-in tools for routing, authentication, database management, and API development, enabling efficient and structured backend development.

2025.title: Backend as Service( BaaS)
2025.description: A cloud computing model that provides ready-made backend infrastructure and tools so developers can focus on building the frontend (UI/UX) instead of managing servers, databases, and APIs.
